text: Schwerin (, , ; Mecklenburgian Low German: Swerin; (, Suerinum) is the capital city of the state of Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania. It has a population of 97,000. It is the second biggest city (behind Rostock) in the state. It is the smallest capital of a German state. ==Gallery== File:Schwerin Castle Aerial View Island Luftbild Schweriner Schloss Insel See.jpg|Schwerin Castle == References == ==Other websites== Category:States of the Holy Roman Empire Category:Urban districts of Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania Category:German state capitals
title: Schwerin
